description: Complete system overview documenting the investment analysis platform architecture, key components, and their interactions. Includes high-level workflow diagrams and system boundaries.

Comprehensive documentation of the investment domain data models including Deal, Evidence, Document, and Analysis entities. Details relationships, constraints, and state transitions in the deal analysis pipeline.

Detailed documentation of core scoring algorithms including deal confidence scoring, risk assessment calculations, ROI projections, and market analysis formulas. Includes weightings, thresholds, and decision logic.
Documentation of the data flow through the deal analysis system, covering document processing pipeline, evidence extraction, AI analysis integration, and report generation workflow.

Comprehensive documentation of business rules governing deal evaluation, risk assessment, due diligence requirements, and investment decision criteria. Includes validation rules and threshold definitions.
